channel.title: How do i give a player a starter?
channel.description: how do i give people items when they log in for the first time

item.title: How do i give a player a starter?
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

Alternatively you could put a starter command.

Here is the one from my server:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 5000000); addItem(392, 1500); sendMessage("Go to the skilling area if you need more money."); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but... "); } }

Add it under your other commands.

Doing this would make it so players have to type ::starter to get the starter.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i give a player a starter?
